abstract: Astral Media faced tough questions Monday from Canadian broadcast regulators who suggested the broadcaster is low-balling the C$1.08 billion ($1.02 billion) purchase price of Standard Broadcasting, a deal that will create the largest commercial radio company Canada has ever seen.
lead_paragraph: Astral Media faced tough questions Monday from Canadian broadcast regulators who suggested the broadcaster is low-balling the C$1.08 billion ($1.02 billion) purchase price of Standard Broadcasting, a deal that will create the largest commercial radio company Canada has ever seen.
